name: Russian Cars: Traffic
description:
Drive your car through traffic and enjoy the fast paced, thrilling arcade racing game. Become a best racer and drive through traffic at crazy speeds. Earn points and buy faster cars.
****************
Game feature:
• - Beautiful 3D graphics.
• - Easy driving controls.
• - Bonus points for close overtakes.
• - Two modes: "Simulation" and "Arcade racing games".
• - Camera View From Driver.
